oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville Board of Education Minutes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: On the 5th day of November, 1854, the Nashville Board of Education elected Joshua F. Pearl as superintendent of the public schools. 11 x 14 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education; Minutes
Nashville (Tenn.)
